summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackNUDESTIX's NUDESCREEN Daily Mineral Veil SPF 30 is a light, hydrating, oil-free lotion, rich in vegan-powered extracts that melts into the skin to help protect against sun's broad-spectrum UVA and UVB rays as well as blue light. This 100% reef-safe sunscreen is made with 15% non-nano zinc oxide.
details: DetailsFeaturesMineral, non-nano Zinc Oxide provides UVA & UVB broad-spectrum SPF 30 + Blue Light ProtectionContains no chemical sunscreen actives100% reef-safe100% mineral sunscreenKey IngredientsPurple Tea extract has one of the highest content of polyphenols antioxidants to defend against free radicalsGreen Algae extract is considered one of the richest superfood, natural sources of Niacinamide that provides moisturizing properties promoting supplier, healthier looking skin; known for natural anti-oxidant properties that help reduce the appearance of signs of agingPassionflower extract, rich in polyphenols, helps to protect the skin from the adverse effects of atmospheric pollutantsItem 2605942How To UseApply generously (and evenly) 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Sun Protection Measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a Broad-Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: limit time in the sun, especially from 10am - 2pm/11am - 3 pm; and wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses.Pro Tip: Use shades Warm and Hot on decolletage and legs to bronze and protect skin. Patch test prior to use is advised.IngredientsActive Ingredients: Zinc Oxide 15%. Inactive Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Coconut Alkanes, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Methyl Dihydroabietate, Spirulina Platensis Extract, C13-15 Alkane, Sodium Chloride, Octyldodecanol, Distarch Phosphate, Isostearic Acid, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Quaternium-90 Bentonite, 1,2-Hexanediol, Benzyl Alcohol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Zinc Stearate, Ethyl Ferulate, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Butylene Glycol, Triethyl Citrate, Mica, Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Passiflora Edulis Fruit Extract, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Sorbitan Oleate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract.Nudestix formulations are updated from time to time as part of their commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Therefore, ingredient lists or claims shown here may differ from the box of the product depending on time and global region of purchase.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply generously (and evenly) 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply at least every 2 hours. Sun Protection Measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a Broad-Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: limit time in the sun, especially from 10am - 2pm/11am - 3 pm; and wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses.Pro Tip: Use shades Warm and Hot on decolletage and legs to bronze and protect skin. Patch test prior to use is advised.

reviews.headline: Love this for summer!
reviews.comments: I bought this last year before summer started and I'm still using it, granted I'm scraping the bottom of the barrel but still. Always helps my makeup turn out and coupled with moisturizer will make my makeup look better than any other primer I've tried.

reviews.headline: My skin bestie
reviews.comments: I think I found my holy grail. Super lightweight, no smell an goes on so smooth. 1 week into using it and I love it.

reviews.headline: A fav natural long-lasting sunscreens for oily skin
reviews.comments: It took me 4 months to use up this entire tube and as soon as I neared the last week I ordered another bottle because I fell in love with this formula. I have oily skin and I struggle with finding formulas that work alone and with makeup. This is honestly the best sunscreen and primer I've used. I do four pumps, warm it up with my fingers and distribute all over my face. I use the lightest option which is a little cool toned - I have olive skin so it helps to even out where I have more purple and blue on my face. What makes this one of the best sunscreen primers is that I do half a pump more and spread on the area under my eyes and it brightens and corrects my under-eyes. I've been asked multiple times what I am wearing and most days it's a One Size primer and this sunscreen. And the great thing is that this lasts all day, only needs to be powdered a little bit when it's 80 degree and higher. If you have dry skin I would recommend using a hydrating skincare routine, maybe a milky toner and moisturizer before applying this, but it's a holy grail for oily skin.

reviews.headline: Allergic reaction
reviews.comments:
The skin near my eyes broke out and it splotchy and burns. It happens every time i used this product. 
I dont have excema or any other skin related issue; my skin can be sensitive but ive never had foundation or a primer do this to me

reviews.headline: Protects and adds glow!
reviews.comments: I bought the shade Nude. I'm fair/light with cool undertones. This is too sheer, and yet dark on it's own, however, I use it as my primer. It pairs beautifully with my primary foundation (Exa - shade Joshua), and lasts all day in this Texas heat. Together, they dry down to a glowy, but satin finish, and I receive many compliments on my skin. I will continue to repurchase.

reviews.headline: Second tube gave me hives
reviews.comments: I loved this product so much I bought a second one in store after I was just about out of my first one and it made my whole face break out into a horrible allergic reaction like night mare. It took me 3 different times of ut happening to realize the new tube I had just bought was the culprit. This was my holy grail before thT and I still may risk hives to try a new one but I cant do admin so I never retyrned and there was a lot of heartache having my face and eyes a puffy disaster NYE.

reviews.headline: Second tube gave me hives
reviews.comments: I loved this product so much I bought a second one in store after I was just about out of my first one and it made my whole face break out into a horrible allergic reaction like night mare. It took me 3 different times of ut happening to realize the new tube I had just bought was the culprit. This was my holy grail before thT and I still may risk hives to try a new one but I cant do admin so I never retyrned and there was a lot of heartache having my face and eyes a puffy disaster NYE.

reviews.headline: Nice, but Not for fair skin
reviews.comments: This was really nice, absorbed into the skin and felt lightweight. I have combo skin and it didn't feel heavy on my oily areas. However, this is NOT for fair skin. I got the lightest tinted shade and it's too dark. It made me look like I don't know how to shade match. So sadly I'll be returning it. If you have medium too deep skin I'm sure you'll find a good shade match and like it. I took a star off for the shade selection.

reviews.headline: Nice, but Not for fair skin
reviews.comments: This was really nice, absorbed into the skin and felt lightweight. I have combo skin and it didn't feel heavy on my oily areas. However, this is NOT for fair skin. I got the lightest tinted shade and it's too dark. It made me look like I don't know how to shade match. So sadly I'll be returning it. If you have medium too deep skin I'm sure you'll find a good shade match and like it. I took a star off for the shade selection.

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: I purchased this because it waa 50% off online so I thought i would try and im so pleasantly surprised! Im 46 and my skin never looked better and it last all day. Sunscreen, primer, foundation all in one !

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Blends really well but made me look old. I can see every fine line and pore with a "glow" . I look sick or very tired haha. Nor for me.

reviews.headline: New holy grail!
reviews.comments: This is the perfect product for evening out your skin tone and keeping your face hydrated without too much coverage. This will be my go-to for spring and summer!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Works great as a primer and helps my makeup last all day with minimal shine. Only issue is that the tint is darker then the package displays.

reviews.headline: Excellent for summer!
reviews.comments: I have been using this as my foundation this summer and it's great! Blends in well and gives my face a glow while providing sun protection.

reviews.headline: So far so good
reviews.comments: Been on a years-ling hunt for a sunscreen that doesn't give me an allergic reaction or break me out. Trying this for the first time, it's easily one of the most comfortable mineral sunscreens i've ever tried. It sinks in like moisturizer, is easy to blend, and doesn't leave a major white cast (I have the untinted version). As long as it doesn't cause an adverse reaction, I can see this being my daily sunscreen.

reviews.headline: Best tinted sunscreen
reviews.comments: Great tinted sunscreen that provides hydration and is reef safe! I also pove usung this under my makeup.

reviews.headline: Lightweight and adds a hint of color
reviews.comments: Nice product when going outside, but don't want to wear makeup.

reviews.headline: Really like this product
reviews.comments:
I bought the nude shade for summer (I'm usually a cool ivory and have not tried the lightest color yet), but wanted a tinted moisturizer that would give me a bit of a glow. Despite the dark color it blended beautifully and easily. I look lightly sun kissed with a dewy finish. When it eventually dries down I get minimal transfer and it seems to be a good base for a no make up make up look. I also notice my skin looks really good after having used this product for a few weeks. The packaging is nice and works well to prevent waste.

I'm fortunate that it works for my skin tone but could see how the limited range of shades may not work for everyone. That said, if it does work for your coloring its a fantastic product.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: Have this to my daughter who's 30. It's just wasn't enough coverage for me. Bought it due to an influencer but I'm too old for just a tint it seems lol

reviews.headline: very off color
reviews.comments: bought this expecting a tinted moisturizer type effect. incredibly thick and noticeable - more like a medium coverage foundation. this is only compounded by how dark the nude shade is. it's considerably darker than any shade I'd call "light"

media.headline: This product is not for me
best sunscreen and primer till date
media.caption:
Hi I got this great product for free in exchange for my honest review. Thank-you @influenster for choosing me. Honestly since I have been in Canada I have tried using sunscreen products but to no avail they somehow are either really greasy or leave a white tint behind but I was pleasently surprised by the nudestix daily mineral veil and I absolutely loved it as I am a busy mom on the go I use it in place of my foundation it has great coverage so light that you don't know it's there a little greasy at first but it absorbs well and then you don't even realize it's there. 

Thank-you @influenster and @nudestix for this product which I will definitely be buying and recommending it anyone who wants to know. #GONUDEBUTBETTER #freeproductreview #influenster

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this product for free from the BzzAgent sampling program. 

There's a lot that I like about this sunscreen! The texture is smooth, so it's really easy to apply, and it doesn't become greasy throughout the day. I also felt like it did a good job as a primer, as it seemed to blur my pores and smooth the appearance of my skin's uneven texture. I felt like I could just wear the sunscreen by itself without needing to apply foundation and powder on top of it. 

The container that holds the sunscreen is a light beige color, so at first I was a bit concerned that this sunscreen would give my skin a beige tint, similar to a liquid foundation. However, I was pleasantly surprised to find that this sunscreen doesn't do that (it actually has a white-ish color, like most typical sunscreens). It does leave a slight white-cast on my skin, but it's not noticeable enough to be an issue for me.

The packaging says that this sunscreen also acts as a "daily hydrating moisturizer," but to be honest, I didn't really notice much of a moisturizing effect. Perhaps that's because the weather has been quite cold lately, so my skin has been extra dry. As such, I personally found it better to apply a separate moisturizer before applying this sunscreen.

Fragrance-wise, I would say that this sunscreen has a very slight herbal/medicinal scent. I wouldn't say I like the scent, but it's not straight-up bad either. I appreciate how mild the scent is, and I think it could be a good option for people who are sensitive to fragrances.

Finally, I like how this sunscreen is reef-safe and made with vegan ingredients. And the box that the sunscreen came in is apparently biodegradable, which is awesome! All in all, I'd definitely recommend this product to anyone who's looking for a great sunscreen that doubles as an effective makeup primer.
faceoff_positive.headline: A lovely sunscreen and great primer.

faceoff_negative.comments:
I received this product for free from BzzAgent in exchange for an honest review. 
I have fair, oily, acne-prone skin, so when I first pumped out some of the product, I was pretty scared by how dark the Nude shade is. But once I fully applied it to my skin, it seemed to be a decent match. If anything, it gave me a slight bronzed tint. I think it definitely gives my skin a healthy glow. The package says that it's an all-in-one product -- lotion, SPF, skin tint, but I found that this wasn't hydrating enough even for my oily skin. My skin felt a bit tight after a few hours. I also found that it didn't provide a lot of coverage. I think this would be great on a good skin day where you want it to even things out, but if you're expecting this to cover healing blemishes, it won't do that for you. I've been using this for a few weeks because I wanted to see if it'd clog my pores, and I'm really happy that it doesn't, which can be a problem for me when it comes to SPFs. Overall, I wouldn't purchase this SPF. It's fine, but it isn't hydrating enough, and I expect more coverage for a product in this price range.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great product for great skin days

rollup.name: NUDESCREEN Daily Mineral Veil SPF 30
variant_names: Nudescreen Daily Mineral Face Veil SPF 30
